mapper.select: SELECT item_name, quantity, headcnt, scale, meeting_time, participant_id, content FROM (SELECT b.item_name, b.meeting_time, b.quantity, b.headcnt, b.scale, m.participant_id, m.content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY m.participant_id ORDER BY m.created_at DESC) AS date_rank FROM participants p JOIN messages m ON p.id = m.participant_id JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id WHERE p.organizer_id = #{uid} AND b.is_finished = false) organizer_boards WHERE date_rank = 1 ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
